hackathon-description-text: Hack@Brown is all about learning. Spend a weekend with us and 400 other students to take a step out of your comfort zone. Make Hack@Brown your event by experimenting with a new platform, API, or that idea that’s always been in the back of your mind!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The Facebook prize will be judged on the best hack that "Gives people the power to build community and/or bring the world closer together"
The majority of the team members must be first-time hackers in order to be eligible for this prize. The winners will receive premium portable charging packs and classic "leather" notebooks.
Instax Mini 9 cameras for the winning team (up to 4 people)!
Waterproof bluetooth speakers for each member of the winning team (up to 4)!
Amazon Echo Dots for each member of the winning team (up to 4)!
This prize goes to the team most likely to become future founders. We don’t expect you to start a company overnight--a Rough Draft will do!!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Rough Draft Ventures - Most Entrepreneurial Hack

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Submissions must use at least one Google Cloud product or Firebase. We encourage you to check out App Engine, Cloud Storage, Datastore, and our machine learning APIs. The winning team will receive Google Home Minis (up to 4) and Google Chromecasts (up to 4)!

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Judges will walk around during the expo and pick their favorite projects. Judges come from a variety of backgrounds — engineering, design, business, social impact, and more. Each team will be judged by at least two judges.

hackathon-description-header: Learn and build with us at Brown's annual hackathon!
